thread.title: STREETBEATZ Entertainment & Media Group To Release New "Kendi EP"
thread.title_full: STREETBEATZ Entertainment & Media Group To Release New "Kendi EP" - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: STREETBEATZ Entertainment & Media Group To Release New "Kendi EP"
text:
STREETBEATZ Entertainment. & Media Group Inc. announced the release date of November 9 for the new "Kendi" EP "Mean Muggin"!
 CORAL SPRINGS, FL, October 20, STREETBEATZ Entertainment. & Media Group Inc..announced the release date of November 9 for the new "Kendi" EP "Mean Muggin". Kendi, a multi-talented female artist from Jacksonville Florida was signed to Bocka Talent a Division of Streetbeatz. Streetbeatz Ent & Media Group also is excited to announce the signing of a major Music Film Distribution and Production contract with Railroad Records Swat Inc. and Mamado of Jacksonville, Florida.
In a statement from Streetbeatz Entertainment & Media Group management - "We are excited about both signings and the release of "Kendi''s" new EP and we look forward to much success! We have found some great talent in Northern Florida particularly Jacksonville and have set our sights on that area. Kendi is multi-talented and offers great range and versatility. Railroad Records Swat is led by Willetta Smith AKA "Mamado" the company President, is quite talented in her own right. We have been working with Mamdo over the summer as she developed a marketing pilot for her new show which is in development titled "Another Side Of A Women" that can be viewed at www.StreetbeatzEnt.com (click on the SBETV tab) and at the Streetbeatz Music YouTube channel. We feel this is just the beginning of a long and prosperous relationship!"
Streetbeatz will provide additional details regarding both agreements and as well all other matters of the company in the coming weeks in the YEAR END STATE OF THE COMPANY ADDRESS. Please visit Streetbeatzent.com and checkout all the services we offer!
About Bocka Talent - A Talent and Entertainment services company offering Artist Booking, Talent, Entertainment, Nightclub, Artist Branding and Revenue opportunities.
About Railroad Records Swat Inc. - A production house that offers music and film opportunities along with Branding, Marketing and Promotion services
About Streetbeatz Entertainment & Media Group Inc.-Production, Distribution and Licensing of Film, Music and Live Event production. The company is expanding relationships with artist booking, management, merchandising, publishing/licensing, gaming and live event partners.
